name: CQ.Ext.list.NumberColumn
doc: A Column definition class which renders a numeric data field according to a format string.  See t...

configs.name: align
configs.doc: Set the CSS text-align property of the column. Defaults to 'left'.

configs.name: cls
configs.doc: Optional. This option can be used to add a CSS class to the cell of each row for this column.

configs.name: format
configs.doc: A formatting string as used by CQ.Ext.util.Format.number to format a numeric value for this Colum...

configs.name: header
configs.doc: Optional. The header text to be used as innerHTML (html tags are accepted) to display in the List...

configs.name: tpl
configs.doc: Optional. Specify a string to pass as the configuration string for CQ.Ext.XTemplate. By default a...

configs.name: width
configs.doc: Optional. Percentage of the container width this column should be allocated. Columns that have no...
